title: (x) Buttercup Kitchen - hand lettered {Yves}
content: Can someone please help me identify this font?? Thank you! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051926im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20994.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content: I agree with Yves about it being hand-lettered, but you might find [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051926/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/charlesborges/sarahscript.shtml) from Letterhead Fonts or [Grafia Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051926/http:/www.unifonts.com/intropag/g_intro.htm) from Unifonts as pretty acceptable substitutes.
